name: Baked Spud Beach
description:
Take a trip to Baked Spud Beach and help your spud friend get baked.

Increase your temperature to 100°c by avoiding and shooting mashed potato at cold objects.

Don't let the cold objects hit you - they will decrease your temperature.

Ice will stop you from shooting mash for a few seconds.
Cocktails will slow your speed for a few seconds.

Click or tap to shoot mash. Use the arrow keys / on-screen buttons to move.

SURVIVE 6 WAVES TO WIN!

Made in 4 hours for Trijam 88. All gameplay and graphics were made within the 4 hours. The audio is from a previous project of mine.
